Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We show that sodium channels with the missense mutation recover from inactivation more rapidly than normal and that the frameshift mutation causes the sodium channel to be non - functional .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Sodium channels with the missense mutation |
| Frameshift mutation |

Note: I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph.
